column2: As a staff, I want to generate report with total sales report so that we will be able to calculate all sales made in a month.
As a staff, I want to generate report with monthly sales of products so that can see what items are being sold and at what rate.
As a staff, I want to generate report with the list of products so that can know what products are in inventory.
As a staff, I want to generate report with the list of customers so that we can know how many new customers and old customers there are over a period of time.
As a staff, I can modify the current market price from the price list so that when the market price changes i can alter them accordingly.
As a staff, I want to view current market price list of the products so that if a customer asks me I can tell them what the current market price is for some items.
As a staff, I want to be able to filter products in the list based on product type and any specific details so that i can find items faster.
As a staff, I can delete a product from product lists so that if items are no longer being sold by the store won't be displayed anymore.
As a staff, I am allowed to update existing product details so that if certain items details are changed i can edit it accordingly.
As a staff, I am able to add new products so that when new items are being sold at the store I can add them into the system.
As a staff, I am able to view a list of all available products sold by our store so that I can also recommend certain items to customers based on what items they are looking for.
As a staff, I can view the receipt description of a purchase before checkout so that I can make sure of the purchases and total payments are correct.
